snippet: Gov. C. L. (Butch) Otter on Friday signed a bill threatening anyone who secretly films animal abuse at agricultural facilities with a year in jail and a $5,000 fine.
abstract: Idaho Gov C L (Butch) Otter signs a bill threatening anyone who secretly films animal abuse at agricultural facilities with a year in jail and a $5,000 fine; bill is response to videos released by animal rights group Mercy for Animals showing workers at Bettencourt Dairy beating and abusing cows.
lead_paragraph: Gov. C. L. (Butch) Otter on Friday signed a bill threatening anyone who secretly films animal abuse at agricultural facilities with a year in jail and a $5,000 fine.

headline.main: Idaho: Film Document of Animal Abuse Is Banned
headline.print_headline: Idaho: Film Document of Animal Abuse Is Banned
